body: Hi, everyone! I write some blinds radiance material to the additional radiance material of the 'run annual daylight simulation'. But when I start to run the simulation, then the computer tells me ‘radfiles2daysim.exe is failed to work’, just like the figure says. Is anybody meets the same problem. Can someone tells me what to do with this. Best regards! Hang [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/ylRDB7-m0Mo8oev18epNqq2DsFBvlBnThuG5iWuQeBqbXBxIr-OOCZsVg9SWzLsmw0u8aSkP1VtHfOi1QVtCVzzBwc2LuoDS/radfiles2daysim.JPG)

replies.body: I believe the error is because you have white space in name of your folder. As you can see in the error report daysim cannot find the folder to open the file.

Hi Mostapha!

Yes, you are right. When I delete the white space in the folder, it works well.

Thanks for your reply.
